titleStmt.title: The right of kings by Scripture, or, A collection of some Scriptures shewing kings to be of God also, An essay for orderly hearing : together with A defence of Psalm-singing : in several dialogues with their supposed speakers / by Joseph Bentham, once again rector of the Church of Broughton in Northhamptonshire.
titleStmt.author: Bentham, Joseph, 1594?-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. C. for William Tompson, bookseller at Harborough in Leicestershire,

notesStmt.note: "The right of kings by Scripture, or, A collection of some Scriptures shewing kings to be of God", "An essay for orderly hearing, dialogue-wise", and "A defence of Psalm-singing, dialogue-wise" each have special t.p.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
